mapper.insert: insert into route(owner, name, overview, thumbnail, start_date) values ( #{owner}, #{name}, #{overview}, #{thumbnail}, #{startDate} );
insert into route_attraction(route_seq, attraction_seq, order_number) select #{ routeSeq }, #{ attractionSeq }, IFNULL(MAX(order_number), 0) + 1 from route_attraction where route_seq = #{ routeSeq };
